CustomField.description: Calculates open quantity for Broadcast Calendar orders that exist in a single Gregorian Calendar month but cross Broadcast Calendar months. SMPI-288
CustomField.formula: IF(( Rev_Rec_Quantity__c - Total_Qty_In_Billing_Processes__c + Total_Open_Qty_in_Previous_Period__c) > Total_Open_Qty__c , Total_Open_Qty__c , Rev_Rec_Quantity__c - Total_Qty_In_Billing_Processes__c + Total_Open_Qty_in_Previous_Period__c )
CustomField.label: Total Capped Open Quantity
